channel.title: Inorder Traversal on Hashnopolis

item.title: Two Sum Iv Input Is a Bst
item.description: Given a Binary Search Tree and a target number, return true if there exist two elements in the BST such that their sum is equal to the given target. Example 1: Input: 5 / \ 3 6 / \ \ 2 4 7 Target = 9 Output: True Example 2: Input: 5 / \ 3 6 / \ \ 2 4 7 Target = 28 Output: False Solution # Definition for a binary tree node.
